name: To the Equator
description:
R - Replay

-------------- background --------------

In the end, the earth is about to be destroyed by human activities. In order to continue to survive, abandoned all other living creature, the power of all human beings built an ark above the equator.

At this time, some surviving mutant species left in the previous experiments and killings of human beings are finding their way to the equator from a very tough environment. They are seeking a kind of self-help.

The slain lives do not die, they live on the living.

This is the prelude to the story, and the journey to the equator has just begun.

-------------- credits --------------
